snippet: The fair, art & design new york, will showcase ceramics, wood, textiles, jewelry, glass, sculpture, contemporary painting and photography.
abstract: New art and design fair, produced by Urban Expositions, is coming to New York CIty's SoHo neighborhood, showcasing ceramics, wood, textiles, jewelry, glass, sculpture, contemporary painting and photography.
lead_paragraph: The fair, art & design new york, will showcase ceramics, wood, textiles, jewelry, glass, sculpture, contemporary painting and photography.
